column5: From the Madoff trial court records  7.2 million is a yacht  2 million is just a boat?  Yes the dude owns both.
And on a side note many of the people that were riped off by this guy are now trying to get the tax money they paid on their "profits" back from the government. Dirty thief.
by the look of things he won't be needing them ever again, I feel for the people he swindled.
